Content: It kept crashing each time i got into it.
It got stuck at the loading screen and then crashed

Right so it's a great little piece, well optimised for every phone, never crashes and easy to use (because it's just rain). But if I was going to listen to rain all I'd do is go straight to YouTube... if nobody has access to Social Media platforms like that okay this app is a good go. But if you can don't waste storage on this.
